item.description:
Learning how the Law of Attraction really works can be the grandest gift to yourself. It can open the door to infinite possibilities such as true joy, abundance, and loving relationships.

Yet all too often many people learn only the "basics" of the Law of Attraction, and as a result make several common mistakes that make it appear as though this universal law does not apply to them, and in fact gives them results completely OPPOSITE of what they desire.

We release these myths by exploring:

  • The True Power of Positive Thought
  • The Art of Patience
  • Learning to Let Go
  • Following your Emotions
  • Understanding your Limiting Beliefs

Join us as we unlock the mystery behind the Law of Attraction and Move into a general state of well being.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there!
Please call for if you are joining us for the first time.
Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Moving to a Place of Wellbeing by Avoiding some of LOA's Most Common Mistakes
